official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that any freeze or reduction in budget levels which may be imposed by or pursuant to law should not apply to the Panama Canal Commission.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that any freeze or reduction in Government budget levels for FY 1987 should not apply to the Panama Canal Commission.
